title: BRIEF-Bon-Ton Stores Lists Assets of $50,001-$100,000, Liabilities of $500 Mln-$1 Bln - Court Filing‍​
text:
Feb 4 (Reuters) - Bon-Ton Stores Inc:
* FILES FOR CHAPTER 11 BANKRUPTCY IN U.S. BANKRUPTCY COURT FOR THE DISTRICT OF DELAWARE - COURT FILING‍​
* LISTS ASSETS IN THE RANGE OF $50,001 TO $100,000 AND LIABILITIES IN THE RANGE OF $500 MILLION TO $1 BILLION - COURT FILING‍​ Source text : bit.ly/2BUEMe0 Further company coverage:
